source_caption_data.pre_caption: This extreme wide shot, captured from a top-down perspective, frames a character in the center-right middle ground, standing on a wooden pier. The pier extends from the left side of the frame, with a wooden building situated on it in the upper-left-of-center, also in the middle ground. The blue water fills the majority of the scene, occupying the foreground at the bottom and surrounding the pier in the middle ground, while a sandy beach is visible in the background at the top of the frame. In the foreground, a user interface toolbar is positioned along the bottom edge, a status display is in the top-right corner, and an energy bar is in the bottom-right. A "Trash" box, initially in the bottom-left foreground, fades and disappears by the two-second mark. The only other movement is the slight bobbing of the fishing line's buoy in the water directly below the character.
